Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] Hit-J Plus
Mod.Author: Slimebucket + Digixu
Mod.Description:
Version 2.1 of Hit-J is out! 1024x1024 mode for core 75 textures added.
Magic and effect Textures! 4x size of base textures.
Includes textures for magic spells, items, and effects in GF summons.

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: v2.1 - 1024x1024 of core 75 magic textures added V2.0 - Re work of mod to decrease stuttering, 400 textures added V1.0 - Initial Release
